Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Clarifies the definition of "tenant" to exclude squatters and makes provisions relating to recovery proceedings
Summary: Extends the time period for tenancy rights from 30 days to 90 days of possession; clarifies the definition of "tenant" to not include squatters; requires the adjudication of certain recovery proceedings to occur within 30 days of the filing of the petition.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to clarifying the definition of "tenant" to exclude squatters and makes provisions relating to recovery proceedings
